pieYear.title: Which was your most active year?

pieDevice.title: What device did you listen to music on?

barMonthCount.title: Distribution of count of tracks listened to month for different years

barMonthPercent.title: Distribution of percentage of tracks listened to month for different years

barDOMCount.title: Distribution of count of tracks listened to per day of the month for different years

barDOMPercent.title: Distribution of percentage of tracks listened to per day of the month for different years

barDOWCount.title: Distribution of count of tracks listened to per day of the week for different years

barDOWPercent.title: Distribution of percentage of tracks listened to per day of the week for different years

barHODCount.title: Distribution of count of tracks listened to per hour of the day for different years (in local time)

barHODPercent.title: Distribution of percentage of tracks listened to per hour of the day for different years (in local time)

barSkippedRatioCount.title: Ratio of tracks skipped, versus listened to completely, per year (in count of songs)

barSkippedRatioPercent.title: Ratio of tracks skipped, versus listened to completely, per year (in percentagage)
